C_CHG_SUPER.description: Model S comes standard with an onboard charger and a Type 2 standard connector. Charge rates up to 34 miles per hour of charge are possible depending on the power source. An optional domestic 3-pin connector is available at your nearest service centre.
C_CHG_SUPER.name: Charging

C_INT_NOW_DEFAULT_OPTS.note: This is a placeholder/dummy category that represents options that are now required under certain package interior options, but used to be UI visible, however still need to be visible to a customer in certain UI sections and official documents, order agreement, etc.
C_INT_NOW_DEFAULT_OPTS.name: Interior Package Default Options

C_OPTS.description:
Model S comes with a range of features included as standard.
  • Maps and navigation
  • LED daytime running lights
  • Mobile connectivity
  • Lane departure warning
  • Speed limit display
  • And much more
C_OPTS.disclaimer: Rear Facing Seats are child restraint systems intended for children at least 3' 1" tall and between 35 and 77 pounds. Children should be seated upright without their head touching the roof of the car and be properly belted in at all times. It's important that you follow all provided instructions to ensure the safety of your passengers.
C_OPTS.name: Options

C_PERF.disclaimer: Performance characteristics are estimated or determined by Tesla Motors, Inc. under certain driving, operating, and environmental conditions. Actual results will vary based on your driving habits and other factors.
C_PERF.name: Model S Performance

C_STDEQ.description:
Model S comes standard with a forward looking camera, radar, and 360-degree ultrasonic sensors that actively monitor the surrounding roadway. Progressive software updates over time will enable sophisticated safety and convenience features that use these sensors to respond to real world conditions. Safety features include systems that warn drivers of potential hazards and help avoid or lessen the impacts of collisions. Convenience features include everyday driving manoeuvres that reduce driver workload, such as traffic aware cruise control and automatic parking.

Safety features, today and in the future, are included in every Model S with Autopilot hardware. Convenience features will be included in the Tech Package. It will take several months for all the features to be completed and uploaded to the cars.
C_STDEQ.name: Autopilot

C_WT.disclaimer:
21-inch wheels are equipped with low-profile performance tyres that provide less protection from, and are consequently more likely to suffer damage from, uneven road surfaces, debris, curbs, and other common obstacles. Damage to wheels or tyres from these conditions are not covered under the Model S new vehicle limited warranty. 21-inch wheels with low-profile performance tyres wear faster and reduce battery range compared to 19-inch wheels with all season tyres. For best results, follow recommended tyre maintenance including tyre rotation. Model S does not come with a spare wheel and tyre.

Low-profile performance tyres are meant for summer use and will not have adequate traction in cold, snowy or icy conditions. We recommend driving on winter tyres, available on both 21-inch and 19-inch wheels, in winter weather.
C_WT.name: Wheels

disclaimer: The information presented on this website is based on data available at the time. Design, specifications, price, and production dates are subject to change without notice and pertain specifically to United Kingdom vehicles. Some features and options may be unavailable when your vehicle enters production.
supercharger_disclaimer: In some cases, Tesla will temporarily enable Supercharging on non-Supercharging equipped vehicles to permit pickup from a Tesla location.
incentives_txt: Electric vehicle incentives include a £5,000 plug-in vehicle grant and waivers for road tax, company car tax, and London congestion charges. Learn more about incentives.
resale_value_guarantee_text: Our Resale Value Guarantee lets you enjoy the ownership benefits of a hire purchase with the flexibility of a lease. Learn more about the Tesla Resale Value Guarantee.
name: CS_3_MS_GB

ADPC2.description: Model S comes with a Type 2 charge port. Most charging stations require a Type 2 to Type 2 connector. Up to 23 miles of range per hour on a single-phase charge station at home. Up to 68 miles of range per hour when equipped with optional onboard 22 kW Dual Chargers (Note: charging rate also depends on power output of the charging station).
ADPC2.name: Type 2 to Type 2 Connector

AU01.description:
Ultra High Fidelity Sound envelops passengers in a concert hall like environment that uses 12 precisely positioned speakers to accurately reproduce sound and deliver it directly to passengers' ears. Its digital signal processing was developed with well known record producers and is precisely tuned for the speakers' placement inside the car. Our sound engineers even accounted for acoustic differences in the roof material by creating a different signal processing codec for standard and all glass panoramic roofs. The package includes:
  • DAB+ radio
  • 12 speakers with neodymium magnets including an 8" subwoofer
AU01.name: Ultra High Fidelity Sound

BC0R.description: Tesla Red four piston Brembo brake calipers.
BC0R.name: Tesla Red Brake Calipers

BT60.description:
• 240 miles range (NEDC)
  • 380 hp motor power
  • 5.9 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 120 mph top speed
  • 8 year, 125,000 mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging optional
BT60.name: 60 kWh Battery

BT70.description:
• 240 miles range (NEDC)
  • 380 hp motor power
  • 5.9 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 120 mph top speed
  • 8 year, 125,000 mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging optional
BT70.name: 70 kWh Battery

BT85.description:
• 310 miles range (NEDC)
  • 380 hp motor power
  • 5.4 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 140 mph top speed
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging included
BT85.name: 85 kWh Battery

CDM1.description: Take advantage of CHAdeMO’s network of 50 kW charging stations by enabling onboard hardware and purchasing an external adapter. Hardware is already enabled on all Supercharger equipped Model S. Up to 150 miles of range per hour of charge.
CDM1.name: CHAdeMO Charging Adaptor

CH01.description: Outfit Model S with a second onboard charger for up to twice the standard rate of charge, up to 68 miles of range per hour of charge. Combine with a IEC Type 2 public charging station for best results.
CH01.name: Dual Chargers

COL1.description: Solid Colors (available first 6 months of production)
COL1.name: Solid

COL2.description: Metallic colors (available at 7 months of production)
COL2.name: Metallic

COL3.description: Premium colors (available at 9 months of production)
COL3.name: Tesla Multi-coat

CW01.description:
Improve cold-weather comfort and convenience by adding:
  • 3 zone rear seat heaters
  • Wiper blade defrosters
  • Washer nozzle heaters
CW01.disclaimer:
Recommended for climates where temperatures
regularly fall well below freezing
CW01.name: Subzero Weather Package

CW02.description:
Improve cold-weather comfort and convenience by adding:
  • Heated steering wheel
  • 3 zone rear seat heaters
  • Wiper blade defrosters
  • Washer nozzle heaters
CW02.disclaimer:
Recommended for climates where temperatures
regularly fall well below freezing
CW02.name: Subzero Weather Package

DSH7.description: Pair the premium headliner with an Alcantara dashboard panel that borders the instrument panel, climate control vents and 17" touchscreen.
DSH7.name: Black Alcantara Dashboard Accents

BT60.override_description:
• 240 miles range (NEDC est.)
  • 376 hp motor power
    188 hp front and rear
  • 5.7 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 125 mph top speed
  • 8 year, 125,000 mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging optional

BT85.override_description:
• 310 miles range (NEDC est.)
  • 376 hp motor power
    188 hp front and rear
  • 5.2 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 155 mph top speed
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging included

PBT85.override_disclaimer:
Tech package, air suspension, 21" wheels
and next gen seats recommended

P85D.override_disclaimer: Tech package, air suspension, 21" wheels and next gen seats recommended
P85D.override_name: High Performance All-Wheel Drive Dual Motor

FG02.description: Cut through fog and illuminate obstacles on dark roads with LED fog lights that are controlled through the touchscreen. Our newly redesigned fog lights are designed to work with our LED cornering lights and headlights as a complete system.
FG02.name: Exterior Lighting Package

IX01.description:
Wrap the interior of your car in the same luxurious Nappa leather used for our seats. Selectively chosen top-grade hides are minimally processed to retain their natural character. The result is an especially soft, smooth finish for the following surfaces:
  • Lower instrument panel
  • Armrests (door and console)
  • Driver airbag cover
IX01.name: Extended Nappa Leather Trim

LP01.description:
Add ambiance to Model S with strategically placed LED lights that illuminate without reflecting off the windshield. Interior lighting includes:
  • Door-panel ambient lights
  • Second-row footwell lights
  • Second-row puddle lights
LP01.name: Premium Interior Lighting

PA01.description:
Protect key areas of Model S against stone chips, bug damage, weathering and other paint damage. Paint Armor is clear film that is applied to:
  • Exterior mirrors
  • Front bumper, fascia and hood (nose)
  • Front and rear fender (trailing edge)
  • Front and rear rocker panels
  • Rear bumper fascia

Depending on the angle of sunlight, seams between protected and unprotected paint areas will be visible, particularly on white and pearl white cars.
PA01.name: No Paint Armor

PBT85.description:
• 310 miles range (NEDC est.)
  • 470 hp motor power
  • 4.2 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 130 mph top speed
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
  • Supercharging and Alcantara headliner included
PBT85.name: 85 kWh Performance

P85D.description:
• 300 miles range (NEDC est.)
  • 691 hp motor power
    221 hp front, 470 hp rear
  • 3.2 seconds 0-60 mph
  • 155 mph top speed
  • High performance All-Wheel Drive Dual Motor for exceptional power and handling with specially designed suspension
  • 8 year, infinite mile battery and drive unit warranty
P85D.name: 85 kWh Performance

PI01.description: Enhance your Model S with LED accent lighting and extended Nappa leather throughout the cabin. Selectively chosen top-grade hides are minimally processed to retain their natural character, covering the armrests, driver’s airbag cover, and lower dashboard.
PI01.disclaimer: Requires leather seats and Alcantara headliner
PI01.name: Premium Interior Package

PS01.description: Add extra privacy to the cargo area with the removable parcel shelf, which slides between the rear seats and rear window to shield belongings from view.
PS01.name: Parcel Shelf

PSP14.description: Annual service includes an inspection every 20,000 kilometers, replacement parts like brake pads and windshield wipers, 24 hour roadside assistance, and remote diagnostics.
PSP14.name: Four Years Prepaid Service

PX01.description: Performance Plus adds world class handling to the incredible acceleration of Model S Performance, while also improving range. After hundreds of iterations affecting every detail of the suspension, our vehicle dynamics team was able to achieve the rare outcome of improving both performance and efficiency. In addition to upgraded dampers, bushings, stabilizer bars and tyres (Michelin Pilot Sport PS2), the rear tyres are 20 mm wider and staggered for improved acceleration on low grip surfaces. Range improves 10 to 20 kilometers over regular 21" wheels.
PX01.disclaimer: Requires 85 kWh Performance, Tech Package, Smart Air Suspension, and 21" Wheels
PX01.name: Performance Plus

TP02.description:
The Tech Package adds Autopilot convenience features and more to an already advanced car.

  • Traffic-aware cruise control
  • Lane keeping with automatic steering
  • Self-parking
  • LED fog and cornering lights with automatic high beams
  • Automatic keyless entry
  • Lighted door handles
  • Power liftgate
  • Electrochromatic mirrors
  • Power folding, heated side mirrors with memory

Autopilot features are made available through progressive software updates. Lane keeping and self-parking updates will be available soon.
TP02.name: Tech Package with Autopilot

RFBC.description: Solid aluminium roof available in black or matching exterior paint. Not compatible with roof racks. To mount a roof rack, please choose the All Glass Panoramic Roof.
RFBC.name: Solid Roof

RFBK.description: Solid aluminium roof available in black or matching exterior paint. Not compatible with roof racks. To mount a roof rack, please choose the All Glass Panoramic Roof.
RFBK.name: Black

RFPO.description: Retractable roof made of lightweight safety glass which exceeds federal safety standards and blocks both 100% of ultraviolet light and 81% of solar heat. Standard with mounting points for roof racks.
RFPO.name: All Glass Panoramic Roof

SC00.comment: This option has the same info as its toggle_pair (SC01 - Supercharging) for use in the UI, but is actually the opposite (No Supercharging)
SC00.name: Supercharging

SC01.description: Tesla Superchargers are external chargers designed to replenish over half of a charge in as little as 20 minutes.
SC01.disclaimer:
Included with the 85 kWh battery
£2,400 after delivery
SC01.name: Supercharger Enabled

SP01.description: Protect your Model S with a motion-activated intrusion alarm backed by an independent battery. This secondary battery is separate from the car's electronics and will remain operational should thieves try to disable the normal 12 volt electrical system.
SP01.name: Security Package

SR02.description: Customise your Model S cabin with private and comfortable executive rear seats. Both leather wrapped seats include two zone heaters and are separated by a wide centre console with hidden storage. Rear seat passengers can control media, climate and panoramic roof settings with the Tesla app.
SR02.disclaimer:
Requires Premium Interior Package and includes
Subzero Weather Package
SR02.name: Executive Rear Seats

SU01.description: Automatically adjusts rigidity for optimum performance and ride regardless of road surface or cargo. Location aware, the air suspension automatically re-applies manual settings each time it nears previous GPS coordinates, particularly useful for steep driveways.
SU01.name: Smart Air Suspension

TR01.description: Carry up to 7 passengers in Model S by adding seating for two children with rear facing seats. Engineered to far exceed federal safety standards, they attach to a second frame that augments our standard bumper with high strength aluminium for the utmost protection. These comfortable seats are hand wrapped in black microfibre and synthetic leather and fold completely flat into the floor when not in use.
TR01.name: Rear Facing Seats

UTAB.description: Complement the interior of Model S with our premium Alcantara headliner, a high quality synthetic material that looks and feels like suede. It covers the trim above the windowsill and sun visors.
UTAB.name: Black Alcantara

UTAW.description: Complement the interior of Model S with our premium Alcantara headliner, a high quality synthetic material that looks and feels like suede. It covers the trim above the windowsill and sun visors.
UTAW.name: White Alcantara

WT19.description: Standard with Goodyear Eagle RS-A2 high performance all-season tyres.

WT21.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tyres for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.
WT21.name: 21" Turbine

WTAE.description: Improves range by 3 percent and comes standard with Goodyear Eagle RS-A2 high performance all-season tires.
WTAE.name: 19" Aerodynamic

WTSG.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tyres for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.
WTSG.name: 21" Turbine

WTSP.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tyres for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.
WTSP.name: 21" Turbine

WTSS.description: Standard with Continental ExtremeContact tyres for high performance in both wet and dry conditions.
WTSS.name: 21" Turbine

WTTB.description: Standard with Goodyear Eagle RS-A2 high performance all-season tyres.
WTTB.name: 19" Cyclone

WTW2.description: Nokian Hakkapeliitta R2 non-studded tyres, specifically designed for Nordic winters, have small environmentally friendly crystal particles embedded throughout the rubber compound that enhance grip in snowy conditions. Includes four standard 19" wheels with mounted tyres.
WTW2.name: 19" Nokian Winter Wheel Set

WTW3.description: Pirelli Winter Sottozero Series II combine both low rolling resistance and high grip on snowy roads. Includes four standard 19" wheels with mounted tyres.
WTW3.name: 19" Pirelli Winter Wheel Set

WTW4.name: 19" Winter Tyre Set

WTW5.description: Four 21" wheels with mounted Pirelli Winter Sottozero winter tyres, size 245/35-21. Winter wheels will be matched to your Model S.
WTW5.name: 21" Winter Tyre Set

X019.description: Improve high speed stability by adding the carbon fibre spoiler to your boot lid. Made from lightweight, cross-woven carbon fibres with a matte epoxy finish.
X019.name: Carbon Fibre Spoiler

YF01.name: Matching Yacht Floor

price_disclaimer: Base price includes VAT and a United Kingdom plug-in vehicle grant of £5,000. Price may not include some local and regionally required fees. VAT rates are subject to change.
finance_disclaimer:
Explanation of Assumptions

How do we calculate these figures?

We encourage you to think about the true out of pocket cost of financing Model S. In calculating our effective monthly cost of financing, we’ve compared the cost of driving Model S to an average upper middle class vehicle of 15,000 miles per year.

The financing information has been provided by BMW Financial Services (GB) Limited trading as Alphera Financial Services. Based on fuel economy of 39.2 miles per gallon and an average fuel cost of £1.33 per litre the fuel cost for the comparable combustion engine vehicle would be £15.42 per 100 miles. The electricity cost to drive Model S at 294.51 Wh per mile over the same distance is £2.95 assuming a combination of charging methods (40% at £0.14 per kWh per hour at home, 30% at £0.09 per kWh per hour at work and 30% at no charge using Tesla's Supercharger network with a Supercharger-enabled Model S) giving the saving on fuel of £12.47 for every 100 miles driven. Tesla Model S drivers are in band A for CO2 omissions and pay no standard road tax compared with, by way of example, standard road tax of £290 in the first year and £205 annually subsequently for a petrol or diesel band H car.

When considering the savings from using electricity instead of petrol and road tax, you can save approximately £175 per month over a petrol powered saloon.

Additional incentives can be calculated from London congestion charge savings and Benefit in Kind savings from driving a Model S as a company employee. London congestion charges are calculated on 240 working days per year at the discounted rate of £10.50 per day. If you are an employee driving Model S under a company car scheme and in the 40% tax bracket, you may receive additional tax savings of £335 per month compared to the Benefit in Kind taxes required of an employee driving an internal combustion vehicle of 174 g/km with a purchase price of £50,280.

Disclaimer

The monthly hire purchase payments have been calculated by Tesla Motors Limited from data provided by BMW Financial Services (GB) Limited trading as Alphera Financial Services. The quotes are on a monthly basis calculated using a 48, 60, or 72 month term (as indicated) and the 15% down payment and interest rate of 5.9% APR as indicated.

The estimated fuel savings are based on the assumptions specified on an annual basis. Please refer to Alphera Financial Services for full details of hire purchase terms and conditions.
